title: 383 - Astrid Daley (Escaped Abusive Relationship)
description:
Astrid honored me by sharing a story that is both profoundly personal and, in some ways, not terribly uncommon. If you’ve ever felt that a relationship (or partner) was absorbing you into an alternate reality, this conversation will speak to you.

This episode is sponsored by Sun Basket.

Find me on Instagram or Twitter.

Please consider supporting this podcast on Patreon.

This Amazon affiliate link kicks a few bucks back my way.

Music: “Brightside of the Sun,” by Basin and Range; “101 (The Good Stuff),” by Knowmads; “Smoke Alarm,” by Carsie Blanton.



This is a public episode. If you’d like to discuss this with other subscribers or get access to bonus episodes, visit chrisryan.substack.com/subscribe
